name: Unidentified_Nihil_Storm
content:
A Draethos individual was a member of the Nihil marauder organization during the High Republic Era, holding the rank of Storm. The Storm led an attack on Agricultural Hub 42, a factory on the astronomical object Chortose, in order to obtain the sprayer droids utilized there. After entering the facility and facing two Chortose workers, the Storm prepared to kill them, but the Chortose were defended by the Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis, who had followed a distress signal to the factory. The Storm ordered the other Nihil to fire upon Trennis, who deflected their shots, wounding one of the marauders. As Trennis checked on the two Chortose, the Storm struck her with the shaft of his weapon, dazing her. As the Nihil prepared to strike her again, she was overwhelmed by a vision of the Sith Lord Darth Krall taking the marauder's place. However, the Jedi Wayseeker Orla Jareni, who had been led to Trennis by the Force, pushed a sprayer droid into the Storm's head, killing them.
The Storm appeared, albeit unidentified, in the seventh issue of the Star Wars: The High Republic comic series, written by Cavan Scott, penciled by Georges Jeanty, and published by Marvel Comics on July 28, 2021.
